sn55.14:4.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sabbaduggatibhayaṃ samatikkanto hoti.
sn55.14:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.14:4.8: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.14:4.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sabbaduggatibhayaṃ samatikkanto hotī”ti.
